channel.title: docker-setup on Ken Blog
channel.description: Recent content in docker-setup on Ken Blog

item.title: docker-安装教程
item.description: Centos7 # step 1: 安装必要的一些系统工具 sudo yum install -y yum-utils device-mapper-persistent-data lvm2 # Step 2: 添加软件源信息 sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://mirrors.aliyun.com/docker-ce/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo # Step 3 sudo sed -i 's+download.docker.com+mirrors.aliyun.com/docker-ce+' /etc/yum.repos.d/docker-ce.repo # Step 4: 更新并安装Docker-CE sudo yum makecache fast sudo yum -y install docker-ce # Step 4: 开启Docker服务 sudo service docker start
